author: andyc
msg: 1) Added a SAX version of the xni.DocumentTracer. This program is
a lot more useful than using just sax.SAXCount and sax.SAXWriter.
2) Modified SAX samples Makefile to add new samples.
3) Added missing Makefile for XNI samples.
4) Turned off printing of XML file.
*) The new samples need to be updated to share some of the same
command line options as the other samples. For example, so
that you can specify a different SAX parser or a different
